title: ‘It’s in the Back of my Mind’: Tadej Pogačar Already Saving Matches for Tour de France
content:
Will Pogačar keep attacking or race more conservatively in the second half of the Giro d'Italia? 'I'm happy I have a bigger gap.'

Read the full article at ‘It’s in the Back of my Mind’: Tadej Pogačar Already Saving Matches for Tour de France on Velo.
author: ahood
